Who am I?

Hey! my name is Thomas Ryan. I am a student at the University of Sydney studying a bachelor of advanced computing majoring in Software Development. I am currently in my penultimate year of study and would love to land an internship with your company! I graduated highschool at St Patricks College, Sutherland in 2020 but it wasn't until my first year of University where I wrote my first line of code, and since then I haven't wanted to stop. However, when I do stop you'll find me either serving beers to the locals in Darlington, catching up with my friends and family, gaming with some mates or slowly getting through some great tv shows (its been about 1 year since ive started Game of Thrones.. im nearly on the last season). I can't remember a point in my 19 years on this earth where I haven't been absolutely fascinated by tech. It probably started when I was a boy playing Pok√©mon but it has grown to be apart of who I am, and I feel so fortunate to be able to apply myself to an industry that I feel passionate about.

Why am I passionate about software development?
